v0.2.7 2014-04-03 -- Initial release.

v0.2.8 2014-08-03 -- Added fuzzy logic for log file rotation detection.

v0.2.9 2014-08-03 -- The configuration can be split between the command line and the configuration file.

v0.2.10 2014-18-03 -- Fix naive rotation detection when the file size is increased.

v0.2.11 2014-26-03 -- Fix error on special chars.

v0.2.12 2014-31-03 -- Added charset.

v0.2.14 2014-02-03 -- ReSpin

v0.2.15 2014-02-03 -- Improved logging info for debugging

v0.2.16 2014-02-03 -- Fixed rotation check on error
